title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4800.8 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4800.8 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) There shall be
no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of
records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification pursuant
to this Part. (b) Copies
of records shall be provided with a charge of 25 cents per
page. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4800.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
